scripts.backend: lsof -ti tcp:3000 | xargs kill && cd backend && npm start
scripts.frontend: lsof -ti tcp:$PORT | xargs kill && cd frontend && npm start
scripts.start: npm run backend & PORT=3001 npm run frontend
scripts.NOTE: COMMENT OUT THE CONTENTS OF clearConsole() IN frontend/node_modules/react-dev-utils/clearConsole.js TO SEE OUTPUT FROM npm run backend
